name: claudia-telegram-bot-barebones
description: A starter serverless function - Built with the Claudia Bot Builder; Deployed to AWS Lambda

scripts.create-prod: claudia create --profile claudia --version prod --region ap-southeast-1 --api-module bot --timeout 8 --memory 256
scripts.create-dev: claudia create --profile claudia --version dev --region ap-southeast-1 --api-module bot --timeout 8 --memory 256

author: Natasha Koh Sze Sze
